name: Ace Escapes The Court of Public Opinion
name_original: Ace Escapes The Court of Public Opinion
description:
Ace Escapes - 2018 GMTK game(jam);

Ace has run afoul of the court of public opinion. Restrained to his chair, he must use his gift of gab to provoke or pacify his opponents into helping him escape;

Software Used: 

Unity

Krita

Audacity

Blender

Music used via attribution license from http://www.purple-planet.com

If you enjoyed this game, please consider voting for it on the GMTK game(jam); submission page:

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2018/rate/301348
